metadata.name: Configure Firewalls to Protect the FTP Server
metadata.description:
By default, iptables blocks access to the ports used by the web server. {{{ describe_iptables_allow(proto="tcp", port=21) }}} Edit the file /etc/sysconfig/iptables-config. Ensure that the space-separated list of modules contains the FTP connection tracking module: 
IPTABLES_MODULES="ip_conntrack_ftp"
metadata.rationale: These settings configure the firewall to allow connections to an FTP server.

manual_remediation:
